roleset.name: broken down, worn out

example.name: the arg
example.text: Are there any bridging companies who 'll do a loan for an uninhabitable property -LRB- it 's derelict -RRB- ?

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5.

roleset.name: neglectful of duties

example.name: both args
example.text: If not, the FBI was derelict in its duty.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on WordNet; nominal 'dereliction' based on BOLT-6.

example.name: nominal rel: dereliction
example.text: After all , is this the officials ' illegal administration inaction or dereliction of duty , or playing favoritism and creating irregularities , or taking bribes and bending the law ?
